data.title: EME WTF?
data.description:
EME used to be just three letters.  

Now it's an acronym. Or maybe an abbreviation. 

In this session, we give you the burndown on alphabetical goodness:
The how and the wow of three letter acronyms,
Internationalisation: what's in a word?,
Embedding letters in your workflow,
Acronym bloat, and how to tackle it,
Implementing for a variety of platforms: cross-stitch, crewel-work, crochet -- and more!,
Optimising acronyms for a multi-device world.

This session is brought to you by 5th and 13th letters of the alphabet.

#perfmatters
